mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEW_TBL(RV_NUM, MEM_ID, PDT_NUM, RV_CONTENT, RV_SCORE) VALUES (SEQ_REVIEW_NUM.NEXTVAL, #{mem_id}, #{pdt_num}, #{rv_content}, #{rv_score})
mapper.select: SELECT RN, RV_NUM, MEM_ID, PDT_NUM, RV_CONTENT, RV_SCORE, RV_DATE_REG FROM ( SELECT /*+ INDEX_DESC(REVIEW_TBL PK_REVIEW_NUM)*/ ROWNUM RN, RV_NUM, MEM_ID, PDT_NUM, RV_CONTENT, RV_SCORE, RV_DATE_REG FROM REVIEW_TBL WHERE PDT_NUM = #{pdt_num} AND ROWNUM <= (#{cri.pageNum} * #{cri.amount}) ) WHERE RN > ((#{cri.pageNum}-1) * #{cri.amount})
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REVIEW_TBL WHERE PDT_NUM = #{pdt_num}
mapper.update: UPDATE REVIEW_TBL SET RV_CONTENT = #{rv_content}, RV_SCORE = #{rv_score}, rv_date_reg = SYSDATE WHERE RV_NUM = #{rv_num}
